Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Windmill Office Plaza consists of six garden style, single-story, Class A office buildings located in the Southeast submarket. The property offers both professional office and medical opportunities for lease and has excellent exposure along E. Windmill Lane with both building and monument signage available. Located near the 215 Beltway, Windmill Office Park offers an abundance of nearby amenities such as dining, shopping and is just minutes from the McCarran International Airport. Windmill Office Park is surrounded by an abundant number of rooftops located in the Master Planned communities of Green Valley, Silverado Ranch and Anthem. Just minutes to the Siena Campus of St. Rose Dominican Hospital, a 230-bed full-service hospital by Dignity Health, the fifth-largest hospital system in the nation.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Brand New Class A Spec Suites Avaliable

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Westbay Office Park consists of three, single-story, and one, 2-story, office buildings totaling ±107,650 square feet. Situated along the Charleston Boulevard corridor and located at a signalized light on the northeast quadrant of Charleston & Campbell, 3016 W. Charleston Boulevard provides easy access to both the I-15 & US-95, as well as convenient access to Downtown Las Vegas, the Las Vegas "Strip", and 2 major hospitals including University Medical Center & Valley Hospital.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 325 E. Warm Springs Road is a two-story office building constructed in 2005, and totaling approximately 70,000 square feet. Situated along Warm Springs Road in the Las Vegas Airport submarket, the office park boasts a great central location between Summerlin and Henderson, with easy access to the 215 Beltway via Warm Springs, Bermuda, and Las Vegas Boulevard. The property also has easy access to the I-15 Freeway, McCarran International Airport, and the Las Vegas Strip. It’s close proximity to numerous restaurants, retail, banking, shopping malls, the I-15, the Las Vegas Strip, and the airport makes 325 E. Warm Springs Road a fantastic and desirable location for any business owner.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 325 E. Warm Springs Road is a two-story office building constructed in 2005, and totaling approximately 70,000 square feet. Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5041 N. Rainbow is a two-story office project consisting of ±16,072 SF.  The building was formally occupied by a single tenant but can be divided to accommodate multiple users. The project is parked at 4.11:1,000 but has flexibility for higher   density tenants.  Current configuration is ideal for back office/high density tenants, but Landlord is willing to reconfigure the building to accommodate a variety of office users.

Well maintained, free standing office building in the Box Canyon Professional Park. Conveniently located in the Northwest Submarket in a great professional and medical district. Neighboring tenants/businesses include Las Vegas Skin and Cancer, Pulmonary Associates, Wellish Insutitute, Allergy & Athsma Center, Nevada Pain, Complex Care Hospital, Couture Dermatology, Specialty Surgical Center, Red Rock Radiology, and Mountain View Hospital. The Space has just been updated with new carpet and paint. It is a beautiful open floor plan with a lot of windows and natural light. It also has an upgraded reception, 5 private office (or 4 and a conference room), 2 restrooms, a break room, and an IT room.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Distinctive Class "A" eight story office building consisting of 215,940 RSF located in the Southwest market with I-215 visibility, and close proximity to the Strip and airport. Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
AXIOM is a Class “A” energy efficient professional office project developed by Sansone Companies. This 160,000 SF project is comprised of two 80,000 SF 4-story office buildings fronting the I-215 Beltway. 

AXIOM will be constructed in two phases with Phase I, which is currently under construction, consisting of one 80,000 SF 4-story office building along with a four level parking structure. Phase I construction is estimated to be completed Q2 of 2021 and Phase II completed Q3 of 2022.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class “A” Office Fronting the 215 & Rainbow

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The premier Las Vegas lifestyle destination, Tivoli Village features curated retailers, services, dining options and is home to several high-end office tenants. From dancing in the streets to yoga on the Piazza, old-world elegance blends seamlessly with today's active lifestyle at Tivoli Village.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The Plaza at Summerlin is conveniently located north of the Summerlin Parkway just off Town Center Drive on Village Center Circle, across from the TPC Summerlin golf course in The Hills Village Center. The surrounding buildings include the Summerlin Library and Performing Arts Center, The Nevada Ballet Theater, and the Donald W. Reynolds Foundation headquarters.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Plaza at Summerlin is conveniently located north of Summerlin Parkway just off N. Town Center Drive on Village Center Circle across from the TPC Summerlin golf course in The Hills Village Center. On this 5.36 acre site sits two premier, architecturally distinctive, Class "A" suburban office buildings. Surrounding a landscaped outdoor plaza and auto arrival court, 1645 Village Center Circle totals 49,468 square feet built in 1993 and 1635 Village Center Circle is 38,522 square feet built in 1995. The surrounding buildings include the Summerlin Library and Performing Art Center, The Nevada Ballet Theater, and the Donald W. Reynolds Foundation headquarters.

The Citibank Campus is comprised of two buildings totaling ±309,100 square feet of office space and were built in 1985. Currently, Building 1 is available and is made up of two stories at approximately ±175,600 square feet in total. Citibank Campus is conveniently located just outside of Summerlin, a master-planned community.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: UNLV Tech Park Building 1 is a four-story, Class A office building consisting of ±111,051 rentable square feet at the NW corner of West Sunset Road and Jim Rogers Way. Located within the premier southwest submarket, UNLV Tech Park Building 1 anchors the 122-acre master-planned business, research and technology community that will be developed and managed by the Gardner Company along with the UNLV Research Foundation.

UnCommons has pledged to be a WELL-Certified building project, the first of its kind in Nevada

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A new 40-acre community is born to serve the needs of discerning companies and their teams. UnCommons captures the latest thinking in workplace design and the right benefits to enhance productivity. Modern office space with inspired food, fitness and lifestyle options are placed to perfection throughout a campus-like utopia midway between Henderson and Summerlin. In the blossoming area at South Durango and the I-215 Beltway, UnCommons bridges work, life and harmony for the majority of Las Vegans. Uncommons doesn’t conjure up the same office versus life separation that exists in the market today. 

Imagine a workplace campus that’s all about you and your team. You’ll discover retail and pop-up shops that reflect wellness trends, edited brands and entertainment options that provide the perfect break. Thoughtfully curated food, entertainment and wellness options rub elbows with on-site services that daily life
simplify. Working here means strolling to all the good stuff, like crave-worthy meals, entertainment and cultural events making UnCommons the perfect work life harmony destination.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New 40-acre Community

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Superior quality 2nd generation office space

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is conveniently located near the 215 Beltway, within 15 minutes of Summerlin South, Downtown Summerlin, McCarran International Airport, the Las Vegas Strip, the Convention Center, Henderson, and many other amenities.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: MagnuM Tower @ The Bend is a five-story, 140,000 square foot office building located in the highly desirable southwest area of the Las Vegas Valley. In addition to boasting sweeping views of the Las Vegas Valley, MagnuM Tower @ The Bend Kampus will be surrounded by an abundance of dining and retail options, with convenient access to the 215 Beltway.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
MagnuM Tower is a contemporary five-story, 140,000 square foot
boutique office building, ideal for users looking to elevate their brand.
Located in the highly desired southwest part of the Las Vegas Valley, this
Class-A office space offers 28,000 square foot floor plates, customizable
for any type of user. 

Driven by technology and changing work styles, MagnuM Tower
addresses the growing need for stimulating, multipurpose and flexible
spaces to support creativity, productivity and teamwork.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Gramercy is a Class A mixed use project consisting of approximately 200,000 rentable square feet of existing office and retail space. The Gramercy is made up of two 3-story buildings comprised of first floor retail along with second and third floor office space. Conveniently located along the I-215 Beltway on Russell Rd., the property has immediate access and excellent freeway visibility. Located within 15-20 minutes of Downtown Las Vegas, Green Valley, Summerlin and McCarran International Airport.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Fashionistas, foodies, sports fans, fitness junkies and funseekers all gather on the bustling city blocks of Downtown Summerlin. Here, the lines between work and play are beautifully blurred. The Downtown Summerlin area is home to three Class A towers, nearly 400 luxury rental residences at Constellation and Tanager, Red Rock Casino Resort & Spa, City National Arena - practice facility  for the National Hockey League's Vegas Golden Knights and Las Vegas Ballpark - a 10,000-capacity Triple-A baseball Stadium home to the Las Vegas Aviators which hosts more than 100 events annually.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ten stories of sleek, professional Class A office space sits atop Summerlin's vibrant, ever-growing community with endless business opportunities. 1700 Pavilion will boast unparalleled views with unlimited potential, against the perfect boardroom backdrop - from Red Rock Canyon to the Las Vegas Strip.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: IN NEGOTIATION. Suite 800 is built out with a reception area, 2 conference rooms, 11 private offices, work room, meeting room, break room and open bullpen area.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: LEED Certified Silver, core and shell.
Green building initiatives throughout, including high-efficiency air conditioning to reduce energy consumption, waste management, recycling programs and more.
Limited Availability of “Class A” office space in this area.
Secured covered reserved parking is available in a multi level parking structure along with abundant surface and customer parking.
CenturyLink Fiber+ is available in the building providing symmetrical, dedicated Internet access with speeds up to 1 Gig, as well as cloud services and hosted voice solutions.
Cox Communications fiber is available in the building with all their related services.
A wide array of entertainment options and unique destination dining will create a one of a kind experience to serve tenants & clients from all areas of the Las Vegas Valley.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Downtown Summerlin, one of the premier regional mixed-use development sites in the U.S., is a part of a planned urban center which will serve the entire Las Vegas Valley with over 125 shops and restaurants in an open-air shopping environment. One Summerlin office tower is in the center of the 106-acre, 1.6 million sf of mixed-use developments consisting of elegant retail space and anchored by three major department stores including Macys and Dillard's.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: One Summerlin is comprised of approximately 206,279 sf of Class A office space that sits atop a retail ground floor base. As a classic center core office building, these offices provide nine floors of 30-40 foot clear span space, allowing for flexible open plans as well as perimeter office layouts. Floor plate sizes pushing above 25,000 sf gross allows for connectivity between numerous working groups to reside in one collective space. The sleek exterior will bring a modern, state-of-the-art design to the community skyline. Composed of high performance glass, maximum transparency to the stunning surrounding views of Red Rock National Conservation Area and downtown Las Vegas are enhanced while glare and heat gain to the interior is minimized. A large multi-story window on the east and west sides, distinctively defines the two main entrances into a light-filled, promenade style lobby - seamlessly connecting the surrounding shops, restaurants and vibrant lifestyle of The Shops at Summerlin. The Shops at Summerlin, one of the premier regional mixed-use development sites in the U.S., will be part of a planned urban center which will serve the entire Las Vegas Valley with over 125 shops and restaurants in an open-air shopping environment. One Summerlin office tower will be in the center of the 106-acre, 1.6 million sf of mixed-use developments consisting of elegant retail space and anchored by three major department stores including Macys and Dillards.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Space Available at One Summerlin!

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Suite I200 is currently in grey shell condition, ready for tenant's personalized improvements. This suite has a south facing exclusive 1st floor lobby entrance and has a great window line allowing an abundance of natural light.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: CenturyLink Fiber+ is available in the building providing symmetrical, dedicated Internet access with speeds up to 1 Gig, as well as cloud services and hosted voice solutions
Cox Communications fiber is available in the building with all their related services.
A wide array of entertainment options and unique destination dining will create a one of a kind experience to serve tenants & clients from all areas of the Las Vegas Valley.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The Shops at Summerlin, one of the premier regional mixed-use development sites in the U.S., is a part of an urban center which serves the entire Las Vegas Valley with over 125 shops and restaurants in an open-air shopping environment. Today, Downtown Summerlin is also home to City National Arena, practice facility for the National Hockey League’s Vegas Golden Knights, and in April 2019, Downtown Summerlin will welcome Las Vegas Ballpark, a 10,000-capacity minor league baseball stadium.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Downtown Summerlin is part of a planned urban center, serving the entire Las Vegas Valley. It includes retail, entertainment, office, hotel and multi-family residential elements, all designed to create a vibrant, walkable urban core within the award-winning 22,500-acre Summerlin master planned community. Downtown Summerlin totals nearly 400 acres and features more than 125 stores and restaurants in a streetscape-shopping environment with pedestrian thoroughfares and dynamic storefronts.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 13,192 SF of Office Space Above Retail Available at Downtown Summerlin!

Downtown Summerlin totals nearly 400 acres and features more than 125 stores and restaurants in a streetscape-shopping environment with pedestrian thoroughfares and dynamic storefronts.
